description: After an enemy {ACTION_attacks}, they are afflicted with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SCORN} and lose 35% {STAT_attack}. After an enemy {ACTION_casts} a spell, they are afflicted with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SILENCE} and lose 35% {STAT_intelligence}. Enemies can have both {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SCORN} and {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_SILENCE} at the same time.
name: Pumpkin Pie Haircutted Freak
